title: Microfiber Towels (Pack)
notes: Lint-free; great for glass and general cleanup.

title: Paper Towels (Bulk)
notes: Keep a roll near your tank for quick drips.

title: Reusable Spray Bottles (2-Pack)
notes: Label one for distilled water + vinegar mix.

title: Distilled Water (1 Gal)
notes: Use with vinegar for exterior glass cleaning.

title: Nitrile/Neoprene Gloves
notes: Dedicated set for tank maintenance only.

title: 5-Gallon Bucket (Dedicated)
notes: Do not repurpose; keep for aquarium use only.

title: Cable Ties / Velcro Straps
notes: Tidy cords; add drip loops for safety.

title: Small Parts Organizer
notes: Store spare media, o-rings, test kit bits.

title: Silicone Mat / Tray
notes: Set damp tools on this to protect surfaces.
